Name: Variables - Find Unreplaced
Description: Searches `Web.config` or `App.config` files looking for Octopus Deploy variables that have not been replaced. Alternatively, any arbitrary file can be checked.
Author: Swoogan

Parameters.Name: Path
Parameters.Label: Path
Parameters.HelpText: The folders to search for files in. Enter multiple paths on separate lines.

Parameters.Name: Files
Parameters.Label: Files
Parameters.HelpText: An array of all the files or globs to search in. Defaults to `*.config`. Multiple items can be separated with a semicolon `;`.

Parameters.Name: Exclude
Parameters.Label: Exclude
Parameters.HelpText: Files or globs to ignore. Multiple items can be separated with a semicolon `;`.

Parameters.Name: Recurse
Parameters.Label: Recurse
Parameters.HelpText: Determines whether or not the step should look through the items in `Path` recursively.

Parameters.Name: TreatAsError
Parameters.Label: Treat as an error?
Parameters.HelpText: Determines if the step will cause the build to fail or issue a warning. By default it will only warn of a problem.
